topic.title: Exercise: meas002 - Study time and exam grade

section.p: The study time and marks of some students is listed in the following figure.
Imagine a linear relationship and determine the equation where the mark is a function from the study time.

section.title: Solution
section.p: The independent variable (x) is study time and the dependent variable (y) is marked. Determine the slope of the line with the function SLOPE() and the interception with the y-axis with the function INTERCEPT().
